name: A Simple Button
description:
A simple boilerplate button component using auto-layout and variants.


2 styles:

  • Filled
  • Outline


3 states:

  • Default
  • Hover
  • Pressed


4 types of content:

  • Label only (Text)
  • Icon & label (Icon left)
  • Label & Icon (icon right)
  • Icon only (Square button)


It uses FontAwesome Free icons. Install & usage instructions included on a separate page.
